languages.text: Чудовищный Предок, Патриарх культа Хищной звезды, повержен, а с его паствой покончено раз и навсегда.
The monstrous Sire, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his Congregation has been vanquished once and for all.
languages.original_text: Чудовищный Предок, Патриарх культа Хищной звезды, повержен, а с его паствой покончено раз и навсегда.

traits.locale_text: The monstrous Ancestor, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star is defeated, and his brood is vanquished once and for all.
The monstrous Ancestor, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star is defeated, and his brood is vanquished once and for all.
The monstrous Ancestor, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his brood has been vanquished once and for all.
The monstrous Ancestor, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his brood has been vanquished once and for all.
The monstrous Sire, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his Congregation has been vanquished once and for all.
The monstrous Sire, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his Congregation has been vanquished once and for all.

languages.text: El monstruoso Progenitor, patriarca del Culto de la Estrella Voraz, ha sido derrotado y su congregación eliminada de una vez por todas.
languages.original_text: The monstrous Sire, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his Congregation has been vanquished once and for all.

traits.locale_text: El monstruoso Abuelo, patriarca del Culto de la Estrella Voraz, ha sido derrotado y su progenie eliminada de una vez por todas.

languages.text: 鴉星教団の教父、恐ろしいサイアーを倒して、その巣族は残らず滅ぼした。
languages.original_text: The monstrous Sire, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his Congregation has been vanquished once and for all.

traits.locale_text: 鴉星教団の教父、恐ろしいグランドファーザーを倒して、その巣族は残らず滅ぼした。

languages.text: 可怕的怪物，饥渴之星教团的族长，已经被消灭了，它所有的子嗣也被彻底铲除了。
languages.original_text: The monstrous Sire, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his Congregation has been vanquished once and for all.

traits.locale_text: 可怕的怪物“祖父”，饥渴之星教团的虫群族长，已经被消灭了，它所有的子嗣也被彻底铲除了。

languages.text: Der monströse Schöpfer, Patriarch des Kultes des Hungrigen Sterns, ist besiegt. Seine Kongregation ist ein für alle Mal bezwungen.
languages.original_text: The monstrous Sire, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his Congregation has been vanquished once and for all.

traits.locale_text: Der monströse Großvater, Patriarch des Kults des Hungrigen Sterns, ist besiegt. Seine Rotte ist ein für alle Mal bezwungen.

languages.text: Le monstrueux Sire, patriarche du culte de l'Étoile vorace, est vaincu, et sa Congrégation a été éliminée une bonne fois pour toutes.
languages.original_text: The monstrous Sire, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his Congregation has been vanquished once and for all.

traits.locale_text: Le monstrueux Père, patriarche du culte de l'Étoile vorace, est vaincu, et son engeance a été éliminée une bonne fois pour toutes.

languages.text: Doymak Bilmez Yıldız Tarikatı Reisi olan, Efendi denen canavar mağlup edildi ve cemaati nihai olarak ortadan kaldırıldı.
languages.original_text: The monstrous Sire, Patriarch of the Cult of the Ravenous Star, is defeated, and his Congregation has been vanquished once and for all.
